original_text: He shall put on the holy linen coat, and he shall have the linen breeches upon his flesh, and shall be girded with a linen girdle, and with the linen mitre shall he be attired: these are holy garments; therefore shall he wash his flesh in water, and so put them on.
korean_text: 거룩한 세마포 속옷을 입으며 세마포 속바지를 몸에 입고 세마포 띠를 띠며 세마포 관을 쓸지니 이것들은 거룩한 옷이라 물로 그의 몸을 씻고 입을 것이며

sentences.original_text: He shall put on the holy linen coat
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 거룩한 삼 베옷을 입을 것이며

sentences.original_text: and he shall have the linen breeches upon his flesh
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 자기 살 위에 삼 베바지를 입을 것이며

sentences.original_text: and shall be girded with a linen girdle
and with the linen mitre shall he be attired
therefore shall he wash his flesh in water
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 그는 물로 자기 살을 씻을 것이며
